channel.title: VPS (Not Sure If This Is Right Section...)
channel.description:
Hey all, just got a few questions regarding VPS:
1. I can't portforward with my router and im sick of running a hamachi server with no one wanting to join because it is hamachi, if I bought a VPS would that mean it would have it's own IP without me needing to portforward or use hamachi?
2. Where can I buy VPS from?
3. What's the cheapest VPS since it's a new server with very few players?
Any help is greatly apreciated. Thanks! ;)

item.title: VPS (Not Sure If This Is Right Section...)
item.dc:creator: @Pure_Demons Pure Demons
item.description:
@Pure_Demons wrote:

[quote=“Telenim, post:10, topic:326366”][quote author=Pure Demons link=topic=422777.msg3103495#msg3103495 date=1263907045]

[quote author=Telenim link=topic=422777.msg3103471#msg3103471 date=1263905381]

Wow that’s quite cheap, thanks for responding. Does anyone know if I would still be required to use hamachi or portforward? or would the VPS have to worry bout that?

Thanks again.

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,383567.0.html
[/quote]Who would want to portforward with uTorrent on their VPS?..

I was just answering a stupid question. You CLEARLY said USUALLY.
[/quote]… All VPS’s should be able to portforward on anyway, so why uTorrent?[/quote]

Idk, it’s the easist way.

Read full topic
item.source: VPS (Not Sure If This Is Right Section...)

item.title: VPS (Not Sure If This Is Right Section...)
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

When you buy a VPS you usually don’t need to portforward. There is a tutorial in the tutorial section on how to use your VPS, as well.

  1. Everyone connects to your VPS IP,

    When you buy a VPS you usually don’t need to portforward.

  2. http://www.vpsland.com is very cheap.

  3. Whatever you can get for cheapest @ vpsland, IIRC you can use some code to get 50% off.

Read full topic
item.source: VPS (Not Sure If This Is Right Section...)
